articles.description: The Celtics played it straight down the stretch and were rewarded with the No. 2 seed in the East. As Chris Forsberg writes, a potential matchup with Brooklyn didn't alter their plans, a sign of the team's confidence in itself.
articles.content:
The Boston Celtics made the right decision to push for the No. 2 seed during Sunday nights regular-season finale in Memphis.
Boston has been the best team in basketball for the past three months and… [+3455 chars]
